long_description: The Aerobie Sprint ring soars up to twice as far as conventional flying discs. Its compact size is perfect for hiking, camping, travel and picnics. Soft rubber edge makes catching soft and easy. Recommended for kids 12 years old and up. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Aerobie Sprint ring soars up to twice as far as conventional flying discs. Its compact size is perfect for hiking, camping, travel and picnics.
